name: Ecchi Sketch: Draw Cute Girls Every Day!
description: As Yume Akiyama, you'll quit your dead-end job and become a full time manga artist, working in an office with a bunch of super cute girls! You'll need to show them the ropes, and perhaps a little more, in one of three endings in this cute, sexy, visual novel!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel Celeron or Higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: AMD Athlon X2 / Intel i3 and above Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia Geforce 640 or Higher Storage: 500 MB available space
